name: Happy Birthday Boy!
description:
These are cards that you can print at the convenience of your own home at any time you want.

This product contains two cards, as seen in the image.

Each card measures 4.25 by 5.5 inches in size and will fit a standard A2 sized envelope that measures 4-3/8 x 5-3/4 inches in size.

On purchase, you will receive one .jpg file (in high resolution, without the copyright watermark) instantly via a secure link. For personal use only, not for commercial purposes.

Once down­loaded, print the .jpg onto a 8.5 by 11 inch card stock (or even a plain printer paper) with your printer at “best Qual­ity or high Qual­ity” set­ting.

(Please ensure that your printers layout is set to landscape mode)

Once printed, using a paper trimmer or scissors, carefully cut a straight line 5.5 inches from the shorter side of the paper.

Fold cards in half and they are ready to use.

Mail or give card to recipient and enjoy!
